18#include <string>
19
20namespace ZXing {
21
22class BitMatrix;
23
24namespace DataMatrix {
25
26enum class SymbolShape;
27
28class Writer
29{
30public:
31 Writer();
32
33 Writer& setMargin(int margin) {
34 _quiteZone = margin;
35 return *this;
36 }
37
38 Writer& setShapeHint(SymbolShape shape) {
39 _shapeHint = shape;
40 return *this;
41 }
42
43 Writer& setMinSize(int width, int height) {
44 _minWidth = width;
45 _minHeight = height;
46 return *this;
47 }
48
49 Writer& setMaxSize(int width, int height) {
50 _maxWidth = width;
51 _maxHeight = height;
52 return *this;
53 }
54
55 BitMatrix encode(const std::wstring& contents, int width, int height) const;
56
57private:
58 SymbolShape _shapeHint;
59 int _quiteZone = 1, _minWidth = -1, _minHeight = -1, _maxWidth = -1, _maxHeight = -1;
60};
61
62} // DataMatrix
63} // ZXing
64
